name: wasm-polyglot-bridge
description: Rust WASM + Python ML + TypeScript API in one process - 25x faster

scripts.build:wasm: cd rust-wasm && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wasm_polyglot_bridge.wasm --out-dir pkg --target bundler
